Installation¶

Note

Client was tested with Python 3.5.1

There are two ways of how you can install Opentopic Api Client.

  1. Installing from PyPI - the Python Package Index (last official version)
pip install opentopic-api-client
  1. Installing from github repository - http://github.com/opentopic/ot-api/
pip install -e git+https://github.com/opentopic/ot-api.git#egg=ot-api

Note

To use Api you need to have your Opentopic account slug, username and password.

To start using Api you should use OpentopicApi. To initialize api you need account_name, username and password. Client will authorize with rest api with first query that will required that, so just after OpentopiApi initialization you can start using available endpoints.

Example: 
>>> from ot_api.api import OpentopicApi
>>> api = OpentopicApi(account_name='account_slug', username='username', password='password')
>>> api.get_channels()
[channel_1, channel_2]
